website_summaries.verdict: As much attention went into this mixer's design as its functionality.
pros: Scores high reviews for optimal froth
Useful for more than milkshakes as well
We also love that it's easy to clean
cons: Big in overall looks and function, but your milkshake might be small

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine
customer_reviews.text: Made a couple malts already with this Cuisinart machine from SpaceBound. It does a better job than my blender. Just be careful not to overfill the container. I disregard the fill line and just use about a cup of milk and two scoops of ice cream. Learned the hard way on the first malt. I clean by using hot water and run the machine on low a few seconds. It's that easy. I keep a folded paper towel under the machine just in case. FYI, I filled the container and it measured 32 oz. I run it on the low setting. On high it tends to spill over.
customer_reviews.author: Lubricator

customer_reviews.title: Parlor Ready
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Reminds me of the machine I used as a soda jerk working in a busy ice cream parlor. Seems sturdy and has worked well to make shakes and malts. If I could change anything it would be a more secure catch at the base of the cup when it is on the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Yockey

customer_reviews.title: Great milkshake maker
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Bought it 3 weeks ago and am happpy I did. It is sturdy, well made and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it but from what the reviews I read I ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but from what the reviews I read I expected it to be more powefull, you have to let the Ice cream soften.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes delicious malts and shakes!
customer_reviews.text: Love ❤️ this drink maker. Makes excellent malts and shakes!
customer_reviews.author: Thad and Mary McLaurin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t THANK YOU enough; prompt service; excellent condition; Very Happy AA+++
customer_reviews.author: Tina G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The mixing mechanism could be a little bit stronger, but overall this is a great drink mixer!
customer_reviews.author: chorizogrande

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful, Gave me a shocking experience...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but... Cleaning per instructions (mix warm soapy water in cup) I was getting shocked touching machine, Machine was zapping me pretty good. I unplugged mixer and don't want to touch it ever again... If you really want to make great shakes spend a little more for commercial or pro mixer and get variety of mixer heads. This classic is a clunker.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I tested it first with water and the water blew out everywhere - what a mess but better than cleaning up milk and ice cream
customer_reviews.text: I returned this Mixer - it was way too small to make a milkshake and was unstable. I tested it first with water and the water blew out everywhere - what a mess but better than cleaning up milk and ice cream. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job of mixing shakes and malts. I do wish there was a better method of securing the mixing cup to the stand. It tends to come loose and drop while running which is very messy The old cups had a rim on the base. Since the new cups are deep-draw stampings, It is difficult to provide the rim. One thing... It sure looks good! They probably got as close to the original H-B jadeite color as possible without a law suite.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Street

customer_reviews.title: LOUD !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have power tools that aren't as loud as this thing. Works just fine. I'm going to give it away and buy one that doesn't sound like a chainsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as powerful as I would like, but for the price it works okay, It is very tall
customer_reviews.author: sandra Gallion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for nephew who is going to college - he will be the most popular person in his dorm
customer_reviews.author: snorbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these 15 years ago when my kids were in single digits. It's still going strong. I still make malts with it but it's also great to mix eggs for omelets. I usually just use a plastic glass instead of the stainless one and drink the shake from it. Less cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Randall53

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CDM-100G Classic Drink Mixer, Mint
product_meta.description: The Cuisinart Classic Drink Mixer takes you back in time as it whips up frosty fountain-style shakes, malts, smoothies and frappes. It features a slender mixing spindle with an aeration disc that blends beverages to frothy perfection. With two speeds, it makes much more than just shakes - it crushes ice, mixes batters, beats eggs, whips cream, and more. The machine's iconic fountain-style look adds a retro touch to any kitchen as it creates some of the smoothest, creamiest beverages imaginable. Features: Classic soda fountain style|Single spindle|Heavy-duty 2-speed motor|Chrome-plated motor cover|Limited Five Year Motor Warranty
feature_bullets: Single-spindle mixer with aeration disc blends drinks to frothy perfection
Also great for beating eggs or mixing batters
Die-cast metal construction and non-slip feet ensure optimal stability
Heavy-duty motor encased in a handsome chrome-plated cover

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars24 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
